name: Pumpkin Dispatch
description:
Long ago, in the mists of the past, on All Hallows Eve…

The boundaries between worlds were far weaker than they are now.

In the dimming light, the garden of Sleepy Hollow slipped into existence.

The humans, emboldened by ale, snuck into the grove…

Seeking the magical pumpkins that resided there.

But they were not alone in the garth…

For the mysterious Dullahan prowled the grounds!

As the dusk slipped to dawn, the hollow vanished with the night.

The horseman’s vigil ended, content with the taken souls, and he slept among the pumpkins…

Waiting for next year, when the Dispatcher would ride again…

Controls

Left click = Left Swing

Right click = Right Swing

WASD = Move

Objectives

Don't let the campfire go out (refill by collecting souls from enemies

Don't lose all pumpkins

Survive for 2 minutes
